thread.title: Danny
thread.title_full: Redspot Car Rentals reviewed by Danny

author: Danny
title: Danny
text:
I canâ€™t commend Redspot enough on their customer service and overall experience I had with them.
When we landed and attended the location for pickup, I was greeted with a warm welcome. The gentleman behind the desk was very informative and patient, and helped overcome any concerns.
Even before hand, when calling the customer service team, they were extremely warm, friendly, and sounded like they genuinely wanted to assist me with my enquiry.
Pricing was competitive, affordable, and easy to break down. Thank you again for making the whole experience as smooth and pain free as possible.
